title: Petr Vašek
text:
Petr Vašek (born 9 April 1979, in <a href="%C4%8Celadn%C3%A1">Čeladná</a>) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> goalkeeper currently playing for <a href="FK%20%C3%9Ast%C3%AD%20nad%20Labem">FK Ústí nad Labem</a>.
Vašek played for several <a href="Gambrinus%20liga">Gambrinus liga</a> clubs before joining <a href="1.%20FC%20Slov%C3%A1cko">1. FC Slovácko</a> in 2009. He won the <a href="Czech%20Cup">Czech Cup</a> with Baník Ostrava in 2005.
